channel.title: hugo on Hello world
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Hello world

item.title: Github Actions to rescue
item.description: After creating my website with Hugo and Github Pages I found that every time I wanted to make a change on the website and build the website I had to generate the static website running hugo command. So I’ve been thinking How could I automate this process? I’ve been thinking to use something like CI, so I’ve been looking for different CI tools to helping me to solve it, and finally, I decided to make use of Github Actions for building the website.
